title: Art for this Sunday: A Kiko Argüello Icon Showing Jesus’ Burial Shroud
post: As much as anyone studies the Shroud, there is always a new revelation awaiting. I find this depiction quite a revelation in expressing the words of the Gospel and relating it to the Shroud. “Come see…” Yes, indeed.
author: John Klotz

title: Art for this Sunday: A Kiko Argüello Icon Showing Jesus’ Burial Shroud
post: Interesting. One of a series of vast paintings decorating a cathedral in Madrid. The figures are much taller than life-size. Interesting too is the slightly incongruous round stone upon which the angel is perched. Perhaps surprisingly, given the biblical justification, round stones are very rare in Quem Quaeritis iconography, both ancient and modern.
author: Hugh Farey
